about_the_game:
It's Friday night, your job is to pick out a movie from the video store in town for family movie night, there's also a game store with some new releases too.

Waking up in the backyard under a treehouse, you collect your allowance and find the way into town, though you notice something strange, there isn't a single other person around.

Game Features:
  • Rent a game from the game store in town and play it in your treehouse. Each game is unique and fully featured.
  • Pick out a video from the video rental store to find the perfect one.
  • Buy fireworks from the tent and light them off.
  • Use your allowance or find extra money around to purchase things.
  • Many mysteries to solve, areas to discover and puzzles to figure out with an underlying story you'll piece together.
  • Try to find all the hidden Pogs.
  • Use a skateboard to get around quickly.
  • Read the notes your friends and classmates left.
  • Explore a neighborhood, town and more.
  • Several different endings.

This is a pure exploration game with a different kind of storytelling.

Just one thing, don't use a guide or walkthrough at first, try and figure the game out by yourself or with friends helping, you'll be able to do it and will be surprised at what happens, the main parts of the game and story wasn't revealed. Some spoilers at the end of the page if you want a hint, but there are many things to solve so don't get stuck on one thing. Feel free to use a guide for finding all the Pogs though.

!!Small Spoilers Below!!



A big part of this game is video game secrets.
The main 'Goal' isn't the true ending.

name: Second Dreamer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i3 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Core i5 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB Video Ram
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Rent games, pick out a movie for movie night, buy fireworks, explore the town and neighborhood, the world is yours but this particular night holds many secrets.
